translation.en: Good evening. I'm so happy to meet you.
translation.zh: ‎下午好 很高兴见到你们

translation.en: I've read my notes on you two, and…
translation.zh: ‎我看过我为你俩做的笔记了

translation.en: [clears throat] seems like you've been living together for a little while.
translation.zh: ‎看来你们已经共同生活一段时间了

translation.en: But guess what? I'm here to make sure that when you two lovebirds leave here today,
translation.zh:
‎但是你猜怎么着？
‎我保证你们这对鸳鸯今天离开时

translation.en: that you'll be singing in perfect harmony,
just like Whitney and Bobby!
-Excuse me just a moment. -[Sasha chuckles]
I know there's a little age cavern,
but don't be afraid of a little skin-on-skin contact.
translation.zh: ‎不过不要害怕小小的肌肤之亲

translation.en: Dad, I think she thinks we're dating each other.
translation.zh: ‎老爸 我觉得她把我们当成情侣了

translation.en: Impossible.
Please, go on.
I think that the wedge between you two is coming from a deeper place, Mr. Dixon.
translation.zh:
‎我认为你俩的隔阂有更深的原因
‎狄克逊先生

translation.en: What are you talking about? He's my dad.
You know, calling somebody "Daddy"
translation.zh: ‎你知道 管某个人叫“爹地”

translation.en: can be part of a bigger sphere of intimacy, baby.
translation.zh:
‎可以是更大范围的
‎亲密关系的一部分 宝贝

translation.en: Well, I call this a bunch of bull.
And I call this already paid for.
Zip it.
How did we get here?
My daughter… I don't know how to connect with her.
translation.zh: ‎（一周前） ‎我不知道如何和女儿沟通

translation.en: I've known you since high school, and I've known Sasha her whole life.
translation.zh:
‎我从高中时代就认识你了
‎我是看着萨莎长大的

translation.en: You know what you two need? Therapy.
translation.zh: ‎知道你俩需要什么吗？心理治疗

translation.en: -Man, come on. -No, I got the perfect person.
translation.zh:
‎-伙计 得了吧
‎-不 我有一个最佳人选

translation.en: And I know what you're gonna say.
Black people don't go to therapy.
[Sasha] My name is Sasha Dixon, and I live in Atlanta, Georgia.
translation.zh:
‎我叫萨莎狄克逊
‎我住在乔治亚州亚特兰大市

translation.en: Sadly, after my mom passed,
translation.zh: ‎令人伤心的是 我妈去世后

translation.en: I came to live with my dad, Brian Dixon, down here in the A.
translation.zh:
‎我来到亚特兰大
‎跟我爸布莱恩狄克逊住在一起

translation.en: He inherited his mom's cosmetics company, BAY Cosmetics,
translation.zh:
‎他继承了奶奶的化妆品公司
‎贝杨化妆品公司

translation.en: which stands for "Beverly and Young."
It's a new life for me,
translation.zh: ‎我的生活从此翻开了新的一页

translation.en: getting reacquainted with my Pops, my favorite aunty, Chels,
translation.zh:
‎逐渐熟悉我的老爹
‎我最爱的姑妈切尔西

translation.en: and my embarrassing Daddy.
I really miss my old life.
But, hey, learning to function in our dysfunctional home
translation.zh:
‎不过 嘿 学着在我们
‎不正常的家庭中正常地生活

translation.en: has gotten me to a place that I never thought I'd end up: therapy.
translation.zh:
‎让我落到了一个
‎我做梦也想不到的境地：心理治疗

translation.en: So, tell me more about this living situation.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 详细说说你们
‎在生活中遇到的问题

translation.en: Is there anything can be done to make you feel more…
translation.zh: ‎有没有办法能让你们感觉更加…

translation.en: I don't know, comfortable?
[scoffs] Well, for starters, my dad makes me really uncomfortable
translation.zh: ‎首先 我爸跟那些花痴鬼混的时候

translation.en: when he hangs around the thots.
Really?
Tell me more of your thoughts.
Not "thoughts," "thots."
The thots he's seeing.
I don't see my thoughts, I think my thoughts.
translation.zh:
‎我不会跟花磁约会
‎花磁是用来欣赏的

translation.en: No, no, no. "Thots."
T-H-O-T. "Those hoes over there."
translation.zh: ‎花…痴 “见到帅哥就流口水的人”

translation.en: I see.
This is an…
open relationship.
What?
Brian, would you care to…
tell me more about your thots?
I would love to.
-Oh, Brian! -Yeah.
I just love your beautiful home.
You know, I could just stay here forever.
Oh. You know, get your pretty feet off my chair.
translation.zh: ‎把你的漂亮小脚从椅子上拿下去

translation.en: You know, you can't stay here at all.
You know what? My daughter, she's coming to live with me.
translation.zh: ‎知道吗？我女儿就要来跟我一起住了

translation.en: There is nothing sexier than a single dad raising a child.
translation.zh:
‎没什么比单亲父亲
‎抚养一个孩子更性感的了

translation.en: No?
No. When does she get here?
Oh, as a matter of fact, today.
You know… Look, I'm trying to create a stable household for her.
translation.zh:
‎你知道…听着
‎我想为她提供一个安定的家

translation.en: I can't have women running in and out of the house and things like that.
translation.zh: ‎所以不能有女人在家里进进出出的

translation.en: I got to get to the airport soon,
and I'm sure that you got somewhere you gotta be, right?
translation.zh: ‎你肯定有地方要去 对吧？

translation.en: Right! I sure do.
Right here in this palatial palace.
Now come on. I need a full house tour.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 我想参观整座房子

translation.en: Look, we can't go up there. I done left drawers all on the floor.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我们不能上楼去
‎把内衣内裤扔一地

translation.en: Great minds think alike.
[hesitating] But you work for me!
No, that's… Baby!
-What's in this room? -It's a bedroom, like any other room.
translation.zh:
‎-这个房间有什么？
‎-这是卧室 和其他房间一样

translation.en: [squealing] It's so beautiful!
[Brian] Back in the day,
I would have tried to knock all the spice off of that jerk chicken.
translation.zh:
‎我会试着把这只香辣鸡
‎身上的香料全都震下来

translation.en: But I gotta be responsible. She works for me, for God's sake!
translation.zh:
‎但我必须负责任
‎她是我的员工 看在上帝的份上！

translation.en: -[chuckles] Your bed is so comfy. -Yeah.
Yeah, I could just sleep here all night long.
Please don't.
I just want to show you my appreciation for making me a BAY model.
translation.zh: ‎我只想谢谢你让我当贝杨公司的模特

translation.en: Yeah, you know what? You could also show me appreciation,
translation.zh: ‎对 知道吗？你可以换种方式谢谢我

translation.en: you know those gift cards from Popeyes?
translation.zh:
‎你知道大力水手炸鸡店的
‎礼品卡吗？

translation.en: Them sandwiches is hard to come by.
Well, actually, I did get you a gift.
translation.zh: ‎我还真的给你带了一件礼物

translation.en: Something I think you'll really like.
"Genesis, Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers, Deuter…"
translation.zh:
‎“创世纪、出埃及记
‎利未记、民数记、申命…”

translation.en: What is this? Some jeggings?
[laughs] No, silly! They're skinny jeans.
translation.zh: ‎不 傻瓜！这是紧身牛仔裤

translation.en: I think they'd look incredible on you.
They would?
-Ha, thank you. -No, thank you.
Now, come over here, zaddy.
There's one more way I want to show you how appreciative I am.
translation.zh:
‎我还有一个办法
‎让你知道我是多么感激你

translation.en: [imitating Al Pacino] Just when I thought I was out, they pull me back in.
translation.zh:
‎正当我以为我已经摆脱了的时候
‎他们又把我拉了回去

translation.en: -[smoke alarm beeping] -[in normal voice] Saved by the bell.
Hey, uh, listen. I'm gonna go downstairs and check on the house,
translation.zh: ‎嘿 听着 我下楼去检查一下

translation.en: make sure it ain't on fire, okay?
translation.zh: ‎确保房子没有着火 好吗？

translation.en: And hold these biker shorts.
I like to interject myself…
Excuse me, baby.
Let me get on in here.
I like to interject myself into the…
the process that I put my patients through,
translation.zh: ‎我让患者完成的治疗过程当中

translation.en: and I call this "hands-on therapy."
Some people call it a "threesome," but--
translation.zh: ‎也有人称之为“三人行” 不过…

translation.en: -Whoa, whoa, whoa! -[Sasha] What?
-What? -She's my daughter!
That's my dad!
Well…
Let me blow these candles out, then.
I totally got my chakras mixed up.
Misdiagnosed the aura in the room.
I kind of diagnosed that wrong.
-See? We can't even get this right. -We're supposed to do this.
translation.zh:
‎-瞧？我们连这个都做不对
‎-萨莎 听我说 我们应该做治疗

translation.en: -No… -You have to respect me…
This was your idea for coming into therapy. I didn't want to come here--
translation.zh:
‎来接受心理治疗是你的主意
‎我原本就不想来…

translation.en: -Hey! Hey! -Black people don't go to therapy!
Listen. All I'm saying is that I'm trying to connect with my daughter.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我的意思是
‎我在试着和我女儿沟通

translation.en: Black people don't go to therapy--
I understand. Black people don't go to therapy.
translation.zh: ‎我明白 黑人不接受心理治疗

translation.en: We also don't mess over money.
But you're here, so let's try something.
I mean, how are you supposed to help us?
-All you know is sex. -Yeah.
Okay.
Well, as a father and daughter who are clearly not having sex with each other,
translation.zh: ‎作为父女 你们显然不会一起做爱

translation.en: what is wrong with you? What's the problem with you two?
translation.zh: ‎那你们有什么矛盾？有什么问题？

translation.en: [Brian] Pops! Pops, what are you doing?
It smells like a Snoop concert down here.
translation.zh:
‎楼下闻着就像
‎“史努比狗狗”的音乐会现场

translation.en: Why can't you be like every other father? Just get drunk and pass out.
translation.zh:
‎你怎么就不能像别的父亲那样
‎把自己灌得不省人事呢？

translation.en: I'm healing my body. This is medicinal.
translation.zh: ‎我在治愈我的身体 这是药用的

translation.en: Yep. I told Pops to chill now that Sasha's gonna be living with us.
translation.zh:
‎没错 莎拉要来和我们一起住了
‎我叫老爹别紧张

translation.en: Give me this!
We can't be smoking this stuff in front of the kids.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能当着孩子面吸这玩意儿

translation.en: You guys should really chill it with the weed.
translation.zh: ‎想冷静的话 你们应该吸大麻

translation.en: You brought it to us, dumbass!
It's not mine. I got it from the evidence locker.
translation.zh: ‎又不是我的 我从证物柜拿的

translation.en: If we smoke it all up, ain't gonna be no evidence left.
translation.zh: ‎要是被我们抽光了 就没有证物了

translation.en: Besides, you know Sasha's already 15.
You think your daughter doesn't know what weed is?
translation.zh:
‎你真的以为你女儿
‎不知道什么是大麻吗？

translation.en: It's 2019, for God's sake.
translation.zh: ‎现在是2019年 看在上帝的份上

translation.en: It's 2021, for God's sake.
translation.zh: ‎现在是2021年 看在上帝的份上

translation.en: Goddamn, that's some good shit.
Hey, Manny. Manny, what are you doing?
I'm just checking the smoke alarms, Mr. Brian.
translation.zh: ‎我在检查烟雾报警器 布莱恩先生

translation.en: They work.
[gasps] Speaking of alarms,
I was supposed to respond to a home invasion, like, a half hour ago.
translation.zh:
‎我本该去处理一起入室盗窃案的
‎半小时以前就该去了

translation.en: [scoffs] I'll be right back.
Y'all know Sasha's supposed to be here in three hours.
-[Sasha] Hello? -Sasha!
Damn! Those few hours just flew by.
translation.zh: ‎见鬼！几个小时一眨眼就过去了

translation.en: Is it still 2021?
Come on.
My baby's home! Oh, so good to see you.
translation.zh: ‎我的宝贝女儿来了！见到你太高兴了

translation.en: What are you doing here? You know you're supposed to land at 9:00.
translation.zh:
‎你怎么现在就到了？
‎你应该9点才降落的

translation.en: My flight landed early. You'd know if you checked your texts.
translation.zh:
‎我的航班提前降落了
‎你看了短信就知道了

translation.en: My texts? Let me check my texts.
translation.zh: ‎我的短信？让我看看我的短信

translation.en: If I check the texts, if I…
translation.zh: ‎如果我看看我的短信 如果我…

translation.en: Thirty-seven missed texts. I gotta clean this up.
You know what? You probably texting the landline.
translation.zh: ‎知道吗？你可能发到座机号码了

translation.en: Plus, I'm a grown-ass man. You gotta call me.
translation.zh:
‎再说了 我是成年男人
‎你得给我打电话才行

translation.en: -[Sasha] Aunt Chelsea! -Hi!
Oh, my gosh! Look at you, growing up so fast.
translation.zh: ‎天啊！看看你 都这么大了！

translation.en: You know, I texted you, too.
That was you?
[exclaims] I was like, "Whose damn number is this?"
translation.zh: ‎我还在想这是谁的手机号呢

translation.en: But you kept calling, so I had to block you in case you was a bill collector.
translation.zh:
‎但你一直给我打电话
‎我不得不屏蔽你 以防你是催账的

translation.en: Pops!
I'd hug you but I don't want to get a contact high.
translation.zh:
‎我本来想拥抱你
‎但我不想跟你接触而变嗨

translation.en: See? She knows about weed.
Dad, I think I'm gonna go upstairs and crash.
"Upstairs and crash"?
Wait a minute!
You know what? These bags are so sturdy, and they slippery as hell.
translation.zh:
‎知道吗？这些包太结实了
‎而且滑得要命

translation.en: Look, you know what?
Check to make sure the TSA didn't take something out your bag.
translation.zh:
‎检查一下你的包 确保运输安全局
‎没有从里面拿东西出来

translation.en: I gotta go clean up right quick.
Courtney, we got a code red.
What? What are you… Where are your clothes?
translation.zh: ‎怎么回事？你干什么…你的衣服呢？

translation.en: On the floor somewhere.
Why don't you put 'em on?
Okay, listen, a meeting just came up, so I gotta go.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 听着
‎临时有个会议 我得走了

translation.en: I gotta get you out of here.
As a matter of fact, why don't you go out the window?
translation.zh: ‎事实上 你不如跳窗户出去

translation.en: [Courtney] What?
Please just go out the window.
-Look, you like to play games, right? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-听着 你喜欢玩游戏 对吧？
‎-是的

translation.en: Why don't we play tie the sheets together, and we play prison break? Huh?
translation.zh:
‎不如我们来玩把床单接起来
‎然后玩越狱

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about, but go to your meeting.
translation.zh: ‎我听不懂你在说什么 你去开会吧

translation.en: I'll be here waiting for you.
-No, baby, you gotta go. -No, you gotta stay.
translation.zh:
‎-不 宝贝 你得离开
‎-不 你得留下

translation.en: -[Brian] No, you gotta go. -You gotta stay.
-[Brian] No, you gotta go. -Dad, I need some towels!
translation.zh:
‎-不 你得离开
‎-老爸 我需要毛巾！

translation.en: And she needs some clothes.
No, Sash. We're… We was…
translation.zh: ‎不 萨莎 我们…我们在…

translation.en: She works for me. She's just working for me right now.
translation.zh: ‎她是我的员工 她正在为我干活儿

translation.en: Tell me, how did it make you feel, baby, to find Daddy in a compromising position?
translation.zh:
‎告诉我 宝贝 发现你爸正在做爱
‎你是什么感觉？

translation.en: Not happy at first. Then I figured it would be nice to know someone
translation.zh:
‎刚开始不高兴 不过转念一想
‎认识一个足够年轻

translation.en: young enough to have a TikTok account.
Sasha, I'm not gonna go over this anymore. I am not seeing her.
translation.zh:
‎萨莎 我不想再讨论这件事了
‎我没有和她约会

translation.en: And you watch your sauciness in your voice, okay? I'm your father.
translation.zh:
‎而且注意你的语气
‎不要这么无礼 毕竟我是你爸爸

translation.en: [chuckles] "Father" or babysitter?
Yes, yes. Let's explore that.
You feel like your father's not invested in your life?
translation.zh:
‎你是不是觉得你爸
‎没有为你的人生付出心血？

translation.en: Exactly. You know, I feel like I'm never a priority for him.
translation.zh:
‎没错 我感觉他从来就没有
‎把我放在首要位置

translation.en: What?
-[exclaims] Jesus! -I thought you was trying to battle, girl.
What are you even doing here?
I just got through dropping off Courtney.
Oh, good. You got her back before her curfew.
translation.zh: ‎很好 你在宵禁开始前把她送回家了

translation.en: Funny. What was you listening to? Some Beyoncé? Some Jay-Z?
translation.zh:
‎真幽默 你刚才在听什么歌？
‎碧昂丝？Jay-Z？

translation.en: [imitating Jay-Z] It's crazy. It's the ROC. Started out of Marcy Projects. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎了不起 从玛西廉租公寓
‎走出来的饶舌明星

translation.en: No. I was listening to J Balvin.
He's my favorite artist.
[in normal voice] Yes. J Balvin in the hizzouse.
translation.zh: ‎没错 住在房子里的J巴尔文

translation.en: [chuckles] J. My good old boy, J.
-You have no idea who that is, do you? -Yes, I do not.
translation.zh:
‎-你不知道他是谁 对吧？
‎-对 我不知道

translation.en: Look, I was thinking, this weekend, Sash,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我在想 这个周末 萨莎

translation.en: how about we go to the happiest place on Earth?
translation.zh: ‎我们去地球上最快乐的地方吧？

translation.en: Or as I call it, the mouse in the hizzou…
translation.zh:
‎或者照我的叫法
‎住在房子里的老鼠…

translation.en: -Damn. -Please! Disney World is for kids.
translation.zh:
‎-见鬼
‎-拜托 小孩子才去迪士尼世界

translation.en: And by the way, last time you cried on Space Mountain.
translation.zh: ‎而且上次玩飞越太空山 你吓哭了

translation.en: I ain't cry. The kid in the front had a churro and popped me in my eye.
translation.zh:
‎我没有哭 是前排那个小孩的
‎西班牙油条戳到我眼睛了

translation.en: Are we still rolling with that?
Anyway, look, we can go anywhere you want to go, all right?
translation.zh: ‎总之 你想去什么地方都行 好吗？

translation.en: We hang out. Except for Twin Peaks.
translation.zh: ‎我们出去玩 除了双峰餐厅

translation.en: Courtney's mom works there, late-night shift.
translation.zh: ‎柯特妮的妈妈在那里上夜班

translation.en: Well, what about that sushi place we used to go to?
translation.zh: ‎那我们以前常去的那家寿司店呢？

translation.en: Hmm, I don't know about the sushi.
Remember last time? You had the food poisoning.
You know, you had the bubbles.
The whole bathroom was like a Jackson Pollock.
translation.zh:
‎把整个洗手间搞得就像
‎杰克逊波洛克的抽象画

translation.en: I mean, it wasn't that bad.
And plus, those sweaty palms nursed me back to health.
translation.zh:
‎再说 你用那双汗手照顾我
‎让我恢复了健康

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, yeah. -Come on, we can go tomorrow night.
No, can't go tomorrow.
We're having a little pop-up for BAY, for the investors, trying to get money.
translation.zh:
‎贝杨公司要搞个
‎针对投资者的快闪店 为了拉投资

translation.en: We're going to have soda pop, Pop-Tarts, Pops is gonna be there.
translation.zh: ‎我们要准备汽水、糕点 老爹也会去

translation.en: It's gonna be popping.
And you're an intern, so you need to get there and pop it off.
translation.zh: ‎你是实习生 所以你也要去参加

translation.en: Right. Work comes first.
No, I'm not saying that.
What I'm saying is…
how about we go, do our thing there at the pop-up,
translation.zh: ‎我们先去快闪店 把该做的事做完

translation.en: and then dip off and go to the sushi restaurant?
translation.zh: ‎然后去那家寿司店 怎么样？

translation.en: Only this time, if you're feeling sick, know what you're supposed to do?
translation.zh:
‎不过这次 如果你觉得不舒服
‎知道应该怎么做吧？

translation.en: I know. Make a big scene so dinner's on the house.
translation.zh:
‎我知道 夸张表演
‎让餐厅给我们免单

translation.en: [Brian] Yeah.
If you followed my lead, if you would've fell in Dave & Buster's,
translation.zh:
‎要是上次你听我的话
‎在戴宝氏餐厅跌倒

translation.en: Dave & Buster's would be Sasha's & Brian right now.
translation.zh:
‎戴宝氏餐厅早就改名
‎“萨莎与布莱恩餐厅”了

translation.en: -[scoffs] Dad, hurry up! -[Brian] I'm coming!
What you…
-Oh, hell, no! -Oh, hell, no!
What are you wearing?
What do you mean, what am I wearing? I'm wearing the latest skinny jean.
translation.zh:
‎什么意思？我穿的是
‎最新款的紧身牛仔裤

translation.en: Those jeans aren't skinny, they're starving.
translation.zh: ‎这不叫紧身 这叫皮包骨头

translation.en: They fit. I've just got to break them in.
translation.zh: ‎很合身啊 只是需要磨合一下

translation.en: What are you talking about? Look at your dress.
translation.zh: ‎你在说什么呢？看看你那条裙子

translation.en: That dress should have came with a pregnancy scare.
translation.zh: ‎那裙子该贴上警告：“会让人怀孕”

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey. Don't. Hey, don't film… Don't film me.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 别 嘿 别拍…别拍我

translation.en: Don't film me. Sash. Huh?
I'm gonna put this on my TikTok.
Put this on TikTok?
Oh, my God. Dad, are you okay?
translation.zh: ‎天啊 老爸 你没事吧？

translation.en: Baby, I'm not.
Just know that you're gonna be an only child.
translation.zh: ‎通知你一声 你将是我唯一的孩子了

translation.en: -Let's just get to the party. -Okay.
[grunts] Sash?
Sash?
I need a little help, Sash.
Sash?
Playa, welcome to BAY pop-up.
translation.zh: ‎伙计 欢迎光临贝杨公司快闪店

translation.en: Pop-up? This looks more like a little get-together to me.
translation.zh: ‎快闪店？我觉得更像是小型聚会

translation.en: When the other people gonna pop up?
It hasn't started yet. Plus, a pop-up just refers to a temporary location.
translation.zh:
‎还没开始呢 而且
‎快闪店是指临时场所

translation.en: All right. Okay.
Yeah, I think something just popped up.
translation.zh: ‎没错 有人的咪咪快要闪出来了

translation.en: Excuse me, snowflake?
Cottontail?
Listen, would you like to buy me a drink?
-Pops still got it, man. -Brian.
translation.zh:
‎-老爹真是宝刀未老啊
‎-布莱恩

translation.en: -Hey! -Stace. [exclaims]
-Hi… Sasha! -[Sasha] Hi!
Oh, it's been so long.
Why is your dad wearing your jeans?
Oh. No, those are way too small to be mine.
Hey, Bri-Bri!
Oh! Hey. How are you doing?
You look so snatched in those jeans I got you.
translation.zh: ‎你穿我送你的牛仔裤 真是太好看了

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, I don't… It's…
translation.zh: ‎是的 我是说 我不…它…

translation.en: This is crazy, but I'm just trying to stay tight.
translation.zh: ‎有点紧 不过我在努力跟上潮流

translation.en: Look, there's Stacy.
-Hi. -Stacy, this is Courtney.
Stacy is the key to all this. She's the backbone of BAY.
translation.zh:
‎这一切全靠史黛西
‎她是贝杨公司的骨干

translation.en: She put all this together. Oh! I hear my music.
translation.zh:
‎这全是她策划的
‎我听到我喜欢的音乐了

translation.en: There goes that old-school music. That's my song right there.
translation.zh: ‎以前的老音乐 我最喜欢的歌

translation.en: Yo, Sash…
[exclaims] Get this on your TikTok.
I don't want to lose any followers.
Your dad is so cute.
Puppies are cute.
He's embarrassing.
Well, you know, my son does run this whole company.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 这家公司是我儿子的

translation.en: And I am his daddy, so, when you think about it,
translation.zh: ‎而我是他爹 所以仔细想想

translation.en: all of this is really 'cause of me.
Nothing?
All right, let me reload, try to shoot again.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我换套说辞 再试一次

translation.en: You know, um…
I'm also Justin Bieber's daddy.
Oh, my God. I knew he sounded mixed.
translation.zh:
‎天啊 听他的名字
‎我就知道他是混血儿

translation.en: Right? [chuckles]
-He took his mama's last name, though. -No.
translation.zh:
‎-不过他用的是他妈妈的姓
‎-不是吧

translation.en: But I don't like to brag. [shushes]
What in the double-stuffed Oreos is going on here?
Oh. We're roleplaying.
She's about to depants the police.
[both] Shut up, Johnny!
Look, I came in here to get my business cards,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我是来拿我的名片的

translation.en: not to find you giving my sister the business.
Well, you said it was a pop-up.
I thought y'all hated each other.
We do.
But that's what makes it so hot.
Brian? Matt's here with the investors and…
translation.zh: ‎布莱恩？马特带着投资者来了…

translation.en: -Yeah, I know. -What did I just walk into?
translation.zh:
‎-是的 我知道
‎-我这是撞见了什么？

translation.en: A private moment no one was supposed to see.
translation.zh: ‎不该被别人看到的私密时刻

translation.en: -Got it. -I'll be out there in a sec.
Well, nice knowing you, Johnny. She's like a black widow.
translation.zh:
‎很高兴认识你 约翰尼
‎她就像个黑寡妇

translation.en: When she's done with her partner,
she eats 'em.
-What? -Relax.
[Brian] Cash Money Matt. What up, baby?
translation.zh: ‎财神爷马特 你好啊 宝贝

translation.en: Good to see you. Hey, look, lemme ask you something.
translation.zh:
‎见到你太好了
‎嘿 听着 我有事问你

translation.en: Whatever happened to that blond girl you used to hang out with?
translation.zh:
‎以前经常和你在一起的
‎那个金发妹现在怎么样了？

translation.en: -She set everything on fire… -Yeah.
-What happened to that psycho? -Trish?
translation.zh:
‎-那疯婆子现在怎样了？
‎-翠西吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, Trish. -We got married.
You know what? I knew you guys were crazy about each other.
translation.zh: ‎知道吗？我知道你俩疯狂地爱着对方

translation.en: -I knew that was your soulmate. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我就知道她是你的灵魂伴侣
‎-嗯

translation.en: I am excited to meet the investors.
Great, 'cause they're over there. From Korea, and excited about this pop-up.
translation.zh:
‎很好 他们就在那边
‎来自韩国 这个快闪店让他们很兴奋

translation.en: They want to go to dinner later to talk about the details--
translation.zh: ‎一会儿他们想去吃晚餐 谈谈细节…

translation.en: Sorry, but unfortunately Brian already has a dinner appointment.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 不过很遗憾
‎布莱恩已经约了人吃晚餐了

translation.en: Look, how about tomorrow night, okay?
Because tonight we're gonna chill.
translation.zh: ‎因为今晚我们要痛快地玩玩

translation.en: I already got the DJ poppin'.
We gonna have this place on fire.
-Give my regards to your girl. -I will. But this has to be tonight.
translation.zh:
‎-替我问候你老婆
‎-我会的 但必须是今晚

translation.en: They go back to Seoul tomorrow. You need the investors.
translation.zh:
‎明天他们就回首尔了
‎老兄 你需要这些投资者

translation.en: -Come on. -Okay. Let's do it.
translation.zh:
‎-别犹豫了
‎-好吧 就这么办

translation.en: Take care of it. We'll get the money.
translation.zh: ‎好好招待他们 我们会拿到投资的

translation.en: I need you to take Sasha over to the sushi restaurant, right?
translation.zh:
‎我需要你带萨莎
‎去那家寿司店 好吗？

translation.en: And then I will meet you afterwards. We gotta get that money.
translation.zh:
‎然后我会去找你们
‎我们必须拿到投资

translation.en: -Okay. Ah, what's going on here? -These pants.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 这是怎么回事？
‎-这条裤子

translation.en: I think one of my arteries is blocked.
-Makes sense. -Hey, Sash, sweetheart.
translation.zh:
‎-有道理
‎-嘿 萨莎 宝贝

translation.en: All right, come on.
So, Stace is gonna take you over to the sushi restaurant.
translation.zh: ‎史黛西将带你去那家寿司店

translation.en: I'm gonna wine-and-dine these guys, get their money. I'll meet you later.
translation.zh:
‎我要好好招待这些人
‎让他们投资 一会儿再去找你们

translation.en: So, no sushi?
Oh, yeah. For sure. I'll be there later. I promise, okay?
translation.zh:
‎不是 当然要吃
‎我过会儿去 我保证 好吗？

translation.en: Just like you promised to pick me up from the airport?
translation.zh: ‎就像上次你保证会来机场接我一样？

translation.en: Stop bringing up old stuff.
Y'all from South Korea or North Korea?
All right.
I'm sorry your dad didn't make it to dinner.
translation.zh: ‎真遗憾 你爸不能陪你吃晚餐

translation.en: Do you want some ice cream? Hmm?
Hey, hey, hey, that's mine, now.
I got the munchies in the Uber when the driver refused to stop at the DQ.
translation.zh:
‎刚才我坐优步 司机拒绝
‎在冰雪皇后店停车 把我饿坏了

translation.en: Now, how hard is it to make a U-turn on I-75?
translation.zh: ‎在75号州际公路上掉头能有多难？

translation.en: You know, Pops, I'm surprised you even know what Uber is.
translation.zh: ‎老爹 我很惊讶 你居然还知道优步

translation.en: Oh, no, he doesn't.
He just gets in people's cars and yells at them to take him home.
translation.zh:
‎他只是坐进别人的车
‎大吼大叫地让别人送他回家

translation.en: Well, it's all very confusing.
I don't know why they call it UberPool, ain't no water in it.
translation.zh:
‎搞不懂为什么叫“优步拼车”
‎司机开得一点都不“拼”

translation.en: I rode for 45 minutes in a Speedo.
translation.zh: ‎害我穿着速比涛游泳裤坐了45分钟

translation.en: My ass was itching.
You know, I thought this time would be different.
But it's the same as always where I'm never a priority for him.
translation.zh:
‎结果还是和以前一样
‎他从来不把我放在首要位置

translation.en: Like last year, when I had that science fair
translation.zh: ‎就像去年我参加科学挑战赛

translation.en: and he FaceTimed in from a club.
Well, you did get to see DJ Khaled.
-Hey. -Hey.
-How'd it go with the investors? -It was great. And, you know, they…
translation.zh:
‎-投资者的事办得怎么样？
‎-很顺利 他们…

translation.en: They thought I looked so much like Obama, so I had to hit 'em like…
translation.zh:
‎他们觉得我长得很像奥巴马
‎所以我只能跟他们说

translation.en: [imitating Obama] "And if there's any indication
that an investment in BAY is an investment in America,
translation.zh: ‎投资贝杨公司就是投资美国

translation.en: Sasha, Malia, Bo, they can all work."
translation.zh:
‎莎夏、玛丽亚、阿博
‎他们都可以工作”

translation.en: "Yes, we can."
Okay. Well, when the Obama starts, I gotta go.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 你开始模仿奥巴马
‎我就该走了

translation.en: Have a good night.
See you later.
[in normal voice] They really loved that impression. Did you like it?
translation.zh:
‎他们很喜欢看我这段模仿
‎你喜欢吗？

translation.en: Hey, look, Sash…
I really apologize for not making it,
translation.zh: ‎今晚没能陪你吃饭 我非常抱歉

translation.en: but things went great. And we could go tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎但事情办得很顺利 我们可以明天去

translation.en: [scoffs] Whatever. Can't wait to see what excuse you come up with next.
translation.zh:
‎无所谓了 很想看看
‎下次你会找什么借口

translation.en: "Excuse"? First of all, who you talking to?
translation.zh: ‎“借口”？首先 你在跟谁说话？

translation.en: You know, it's always something with you.
You left me at the airport, you couldn't take me to dinner.
translation.zh:
‎你把我一个人丢在机场
‎不能带我去吃晚餐

translation.en: -Do you even want me here? -What?
translation.zh:
‎-你真想让我住在这里吗？
‎-什么？

translation.en: Maybe you and I are like your pants and we just don't fit.
translation.zh:
‎也许我们像你的裤子一样
‎就是不合适

translation.en: You don't like my pants?
Sash, come on, now.
-You're overreacting. You know me. -"Overreacting."
translation.zh:
‎-你反应过度了 你了解我
‎-“反应过度”

translation.en: You know, you're right, I do know you.
People seem to like you. They think you're a fun guy. But--
translation.zh:
‎大家都喜欢你
‎觉得你很风趣 但是…

translation.en: But what?
You're just not a good dad.
Sa… Sash, come on. Sash. Sash!
Come down here.
I'll take the pants off.
You know what? Back in the day, if I would have said that to my parents,
translation.zh:
‎知道吗？回到从前
‎我要是像她这样跟父母说话

translation.en: I would be waking up in ICU, wondering where my kidney was.
translation.zh:
‎我会在加护病房里醒来
‎纳闷我的肾去哪儿了

translation.en: But… this ain't back in the day.
I think I gotta fix this one.
[sighs] Dad, what's going on? I was still sleeping.
translation.zh: ‎老爸 这是干什么？我还没睡醒呢

translation.en: -This is why you need to fix my lock. -You lucky you got a door.
translation.zh:
‎-所以说 你必须把我的门锁修好
‎-你还有房门 就偷着乐吧

translation.en: Look, just stand right here, okay?
translation.zh: ‎听着 站在这里 好吗？

translation.en: And don't move until I count to three.
Uno, dos, tres!
What the…
Oh, my God! That's J Balvin!
-Dad, that was awesome! -Yeah, baby.
translation.zh:
‎-爸爸 太棒了！
‎-是的 宝贝

translation.en: I mean, even your dancing was a little…
But you sounded great. How did you even remember J Balvin was my favorite artist?
translation.zh:
‎但你唱得很好听 你怎么会记得
‎J巴尔文是我最喜欢的歌手？

translation.en: You know what? I've been taking my omega-3s.
translation.zh: ‎知道吗？我一直在服用不饱和脂肪酸

translation.en: And not only that, but Manny's ringtone is J Balvin,
translation.zh:
‎不仅如此 曼尼的手机铃声
‎就是J巴尔文的歌

translation.en: so we cooked something up.
And I want you to know that I love you,
and I'm just trying to make sure that our relationship… is tight.
translation.zh: ‎我只想确保我们的关系…亲密无间

translation.en: I'm sorry for what I said.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我不该说那些话

translation.en: Ah, don't worry about it. It's just like how people say I can't dance,
translation.zh: ‎没事 就像有人说我不会跳舞

translation.en: or I don't know how to dress. But I think I look good, right? Huh?
translation.zh:
‎说我不懂装扮
‎但我觉得自己挺帅的 对吧？

translation.en: But I just want to let you know that, from now on…
translation.zh: ‎但我只想让你知道 从现在起…

translation.en: nothing is more important than you, Sash.
translation.zh: ‎任何事情都不如你重要 萨莎

translation.en: Not even BAY.
-What about Disney World? -Ah! Don't push it.
translation.zh:
‎-那迪士尼乐园呢？
‎-见好就收吧

translation.en: All right, now.
That was real nice, what you did for Sasha.
translation.zh: ‎刚才你为萨莎做的事 真的很贴心

translation.en: But I still think the end could have used more harmonica, man.
translation.zh:
‎但我还是觉得
‎结束时可以多加点口琴伴奏

translation.en: All I know is I'm in the mood for some Chipotle.
translation.zh: ‎我只知道 我现在想吃墨西哥烧烤

translation.en: That's racist.
But I'll drive.
[in Spanish] I'll bring you tacos, guys.
-[in English] Hey, B. -Talk to me, Matt.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 阿布
‎-快跟我说说 马特

translation.en: The investors had a great time last night.
-I knew they would. I killed it! -They loved you.
translation.zh:
‎-我就知道 我干得漂亮！
‎-他们欣赏你

translation.en: Oh, man. Good. So we in the money.
translation.zh: ‎伙计 很好 那我们拿到投资了？

translation.en: -They're not going to invest. -Not gonna invest? Why not?
translation.zh:
‎-他们不打算投资
‎-不打算投资？为什么？

translation.en: They just don't believe in BAY's business plan.
translation.zh: ‎他们还是信不过贝杨公司的企划案

translation.en: Plus, they found out you weren't actually related to Obama, so…
translation.zh:
‎而且 他们发现你和奥巴马
‎并不是亲戚 所以…

translation.en: Hold on a second. Hey. What's up, baby?
translation.zh: ‎等一下 嘿 什么事 宝贝？

translation.en: What? Trish, we…
Goddamn, we talked about this!
I gotta go.
Gotta put out another fire. It's the third one this week.
translation.zh: ‎又要去灭火了 这个礼拜第三次了

translation.en: Make sure she drop and roll, man.
translation.zh: ‎别忘了叫她卧倒翻滚 伙计

translation.en: In my expert opinion,
y'all don't need therapy.
What y'all need to do is bond.
You need to get to know each other, spend more time with each other and grow.
translation.zh:
‎你们需要了解对方
‎多陪陪对方 共同成长

translation.en: When I work with couples, there's always a leader and a follower.
translation.zh:
‎找我治疗的夫妻
‎总是有一个领导者和一个跟随者

translation.en: Sometimes he'll lead and you'll follow,
sometimes you'll lead and he'll follow.
It's all about love, honey. Here, come walk this way.
translation.zh:
‎关键是有爱 亲爱的
‎来吧 过来这边

translation.en: I want you to go outside here,
and I want you to have a seat in the lobby,
and think about the stuff I've talked about.
I'm gonna talk to your dad about the bill, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我和你爸谈谈账单的事 好吗？

translation.en: It was really a pleasure working with you. Now, you…
translation.zh: ‎很高兴和你谈心 好了 你…

translation.en: There's about seven minutes left on the clock.
I don't want you to waste your money.
Last I checked,
this couch was a pullout, so…
translation.zh: ‎这张沙发可以拉出来变成床 所以…
